item.description:
Join us for our 2nd annual picnic.  Same place as last year (hey, why not make it a tradition?)  

Step 1: Respond YES here

Step 2: Check out this form to see what others are bringing (so there aren't a lot of overlaps or things that shoulda woulda coulda):  http://goo.gl/yJusi

Step 3: Fill out this form and let us know what you're bringing:  http://goo.gl/ktkrd

Step 4: Show up and have fun

(The form doesn't need to be just food stuff... let us know if you'd like to bring picnic / grilling items or games... bocce went well last time.)

*** Bring bathing suit / towels if you wish to swim at the beach

group.name: Atheist Humanist Society of CT and RI

item.name: 2nd Annual AHS Summer Picnic
